context: Well, add them to the list…. Might be easier to keep track of anyone who’s freedoms were not violated by Facebook

Let's see how many Anti-Semitic Talkbackers start spewing this nonsense about Israel being an Apartheid state, and such nonsense that false and rotten at the core.  Let's see if we get Talkbackers who say the Jews control the world, etc.  (If Jews really controlled the world, then you probably would not be able to post here, LOL.  The Jews are not a monolithic group.  There is a Jewish joke that if you have 2 Jews, then you have 3 opinions. ) Those of you who LOVE TRUTH AND JUSTICE please call  out such evil comments.  I have a job, and do not have the time to do much of that today.

Now, with respect to Facebook, I think Facebook should stop being the thought police.  Let people post whatever they want (and I am NOT talking about speech that most reasonable people would regard as incitement, advocating suicide, etc.).  People should be responsible for the awesome privilege and responsibility of using their God-given minds to do their own research.  I think the schools should require a class in critical thinking and logic works.
